mapper.sql: id, user_id, project_id, formulation_code, formulation_name, formulation_material_cost, create_time, modified_time
mapper.select: select id from formulation where formulation_name = #{formulationName}
select formulation_name from formulation where project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.insert: insert into formulation (id, user_id, project_id, formulation_code, formulation_name, formulation_material_cost, create_time, modified_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{formulationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formulationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formulationMaterialCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

update formulation
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
formulation_code = #{formulationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
